"Today I Am a Clown" is the sixth episode of The Simpsons' fifteenth season. It 
originally aired on the Fox network in the United States on December 7, 2003. 
The episode focuses on Krusty's religion, Judaism. Dan Castellaneta won a 
Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Voice-Over Performance for his roles in
